archimate:Assessment.name: Number of architectures with security requirements realizations
archimate:Assessment.documentation: The metric "Number of architectures with security requirements realizations" refers to how many of our system designs have successfully implemented defined security needs or objectives. These 'security requirements' can be considered as a list of essential protective features or capabilities that a system must possess to ensure it can withstand cyber threats effectively. They can cover a broad range of aspects, from data protection to system resilience. This metric, therefore, helps us to measure how many of our system designs have successfully incorporated these security requirements, a crucial step towards building a secure and reliable digital infrastructure.
